tr_quotes.quote: Yapabilirler çünkü yapabileceklerini düşünüyorlar.
tr_quotes.author: Virgil

tr_quotes.quote: Yetenek sıkı çalışmazsa, sıkı çalışan yeteneği yener.
tr_quotes.author: Tim Notke

tr_quotes.quote: Emek her şeyi yener.
tr_quotes.author: Latin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Demir mıknatısa aşıktır. Hep ona doğru koşar, zafer de sabra aşıktır ve devamlı ona koşar.
tr_quotes.author: Sühreverdi

tr_quotes.quote: Nerede olursanız olun, elinizdekilerle yapabileceğinizi yapın.
tr_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan sahip olduklarının toplamı değil, fakat henüz gerçekleştiremediklerinin toplamıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Jean Paul Sartre

tr_quotes.quote: Ya başlamamalı, ya da bitirmeli.
tr_quotes.author: Ovidius

tr_quotes.quote: Erişmek istedikleri bir hedefi olmayanlar, çalışmaktan zevk almazlar.
tr_quotes.author: Emile Raux

tr_quotes.quote: Yapabileceğinize de inansanız, yapamayacağınıza da inansanız haklı çıkarsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Ford

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı yenilgilerin nedeni, insanların işi yarıda bıraktıklarında, başarıya ne kadar yakın olduklarını bilememeleridir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Edison

tr_quotes.quote: Mekiklerimi saymıyorum. Acıtmaya başladığında saymaya başlarım. Çünkü saymaya değer olan sadece onlardır.
tr_quotes.author: Muhammed Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Taşı delen suyun gücü değil, damlaların sürekliliğidir.
tr_quotes.author: Latin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Uçamazsan koş. Koşamazsan yürü. Yürüyemezsen emekle. Ama ne yaparsan yap ilerlemeye devam et.
tr_quotes.author: Martin Luther King

tr_quotes.quote: Önce biz alışkanlıklarımızı oluştururuz, sonra da alışkanlıklarımız bizi oluşturur.
tr_quotes.author: John Dryden

tr_quotes.quote: Limiti koyan zihindir. Zihin bir şeyi yapabileceğini kestirebildiği kadar başarılı olur. Yüzde 100 inandığınız sürece her şeyi yapabilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Kuvvet fiziksel kapasiteden gelmez. Yılmayan bir iradeden gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Antrenman, stres yüzünden meydana gelen enerjiyi dışarı atmamızı ve tıpkı egzersizin vücudumuzu şekel sokması gibi ruhumuzu da şekle sokar.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Vücut geliştirme tıpkı diğer sporlar gibidir. Başarılı olmak için antrenmanlarınıza, beslenme düzeninize ve ruh halinize %100 enerjinizi vermelisiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Spor salonunda ve hayatta gösterdiğiniz fiziksel direnç sağlam bir karakter inşa etmenizi sağlar.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Vücudunuz için en iyi aktiviteler antrenman yapmak ve kaliteli bir cinsel hayattır.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Şu anda bir yerlerde sizden daha yoğun biri spor salonunda vücut çalışıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bu işin kısa bir yolu yok-başarı için tekrar, tekrar ve tekrar şart.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Ben egzersiz yapmaya bağımlıyım ve bunu her gün yapmalıyım.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: 50 yıl önce yaptığım aynı egzersizleri yapıyorum ve hala işe yarıyorlar. 50 yıl önce ne yediysem şimdi de onları tüketiyorum ve onlar da hala işe yarıyorlar.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Benim spordan anladığım içinde fiziksel bir yarışma olmasıdır. Vücut geliştirenlerde antrenman yapıp yarıştıklarına göre bizde bir spor yapıyoruz.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Güç, kazanmaktan gelmez. Yaşadığınız zorluklar sizi güçlendirir. Zorlu bir durum yaşayıp asla teslim olmuyorsanız, işte gerçek güç budur.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Hata yapmak gibi seçenek yok. Herkes başarılı olmak zorunda.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Asıl sınırınız kendi zihninizdir. Zihniniz, bir şeyi yapabileceğine %100 inandıktan sonra bunu başarabilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Benim için hayat sürekli bir arayış demektir. Hayattaki amacımız sadece ‘var olmak’ ve ‘hayatta kalmak’ değildir. İleriye gitmeli, yükselmeli ve hayatı fethetmeliyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Beni bilirsiniz, her zaman iyimserimdir.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: İçgüdülerim benimle yarışta olanları bertaraf etmek, yarışı kazanmak, düşmanlarımı yok etmek ve geriye dönüp bakmadan ilerlemekti.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: İstekli, sağlıklı olun. Bir beyefendi gibi davranın. Kendinize güvenin ve sınırlarınızı zorlayın.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Kendime yapabileceğim en büyük kötülük başkalarına benzemektir. Bundan nefret ediyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Fikirlerini hoş görüyle karşılarım. Ancak sakın küçük fikirler olmasınlar. Bana, geleceğimize katkı yapacak büyük fikirlerle gel.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Geniş başla, ileriye doğru git ve sakın geriye bakma.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlara yardım edin. İnsanların yaşam kalitesi arttıkça hayatınıza katacağı zenginlik ve yeni anlamlar en büyük ödülünüz olacaktır, bunu garanti ederim.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Para sizi mutlu etmez. Şu an 50 milyon dolarım var ama 48 milyon dolarım varken de mutluydum.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenilmiş çaresizlik pes etmenin sonucudur. Bu his, her ne yaparsanız yapın “hiçbir anlamı yok” inancını takip eden bir “vazgeçme” duygusudur.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: En yardımsever insanım ve paylaşmayı severim.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı atletler ve modeller sadece vücutları yüzünden konuşulur. Ben ise vücudum için kullanıldığımı hissetmiyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

tr_quotes.quote: Önümüzdeki birkaç ay egzersiz yapmasanız eğer hiç yapmayın daha iyi.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bu ay egzersiz, gelecek ayki sağlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Antrenman yapmam çünkü vücudumdan nefret ediyorum, antrenman yapıyorum çünkü vücudumu seviyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar yavaş giderseniz gidin, hala kanepede herkesi kucaklıyorsunuz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bugün acıyor, yarın çalışıyor!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Vücudunuza saygı gösterin. Aldığınız tek kişi budur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tek kötü antrenman gerçekleşmeyen antrenmandır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey zinde olmak kadar iyi bir tat hissetmez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kafanızda bunu yapamayacağınızı söyleyen ses bir yalancıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her gün güçlenmek, daha iyi yemek, daha sağlıklı yaşamak ve sizin en iyi hali olmak için başka bir fırsattır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Vücudunuz neredeyse her şeye dayanabilir. İkna etmeniz gerektiği aklınızdadır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Wanting something is not enough. You must hunger for it.
en_quotes.author: Les Brown

en_quotes.quote: The road to nowhere is paved with excuses.
en_quotes.author: Mark Bell

en_quotes.quote: The application of consistent, logical effort, over a prolonged period is the key to reaching your physical muscular potential.
en_quotes.author: Craig Cecil

en_quotes.quote: It’s not about having time. It’s about making time.
I hated every minute of training, but I said, don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

en_quotes.quote: The wolf on the hill is not as hungry as the wolf climbing the hill.
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: You can have results or excuses. Not both.
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: The worst thing I can be is the same as everybody else.
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: Blood, sweat, and respect. The first two you give and the last one you earn.
en_quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Positive thinking can be contagious. Being surrounded by winners helps you develop into a winner.
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: The muscle and the mind must become one. One without the other is zero.
en_quotes.author: Lee Haney

en_quotes.quote: Everybody wants to be a bodybuilder but don’t nobody want to lift heavy weights!
en_quotes.author: Ronnie Coleman

en_quotes.quote: There’s no secret formula. I lift heavy, work hard, and aim to be the best.
en_quotes.author: Ronnie Coleman

en_quotes.quote: A bodybuilder is a sculptor who carries with him his own material.
en_quotes.author: Serge Nubret

en_quotes.quote: Pain is temporary, pride is forever.
The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides the champion from someone who is not a champion.
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: Bodybuilding isn’t 90 minutes in the gym. It’s a lifestyle.
en_quotes.author: Lee Priest

en_quotes.quote: Suffer the pain of self-discipline. Or suffer the pain of regret.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: To be a champion, you must act like a champion.
en_quotes.author: Lou Ferrigno

en_quotes.quote: A champion is someone who gets up when they can’t.
en_quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

en_quotes.quote: Half-reps may build your ego but they also build half a physique.
en_quotes.author: Craig Cecil

en_quotes.quote: Skill is only developed by hours and hours of work.
en_quotes.author: Usain Bolt

en_quotes.quote: Champions aren’t made in the gyms. Champions are made from something they have deep inside them-a desire, a dream, a vision.
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

en_quotes.quote: Once you have commitment, you need the discipline and hard work to get you there.
en_quotes.author: Haile Gebrselassie

en_quotes.quote: Strong people are harder to kill than weak people and more useful in general.
en_quotes.author: Mark Rippetoe

en_quotes.quote: The first and greatest victory is to conquer self.
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: You’ve got to get up every morning with determination if you’re going to go to bed with satisfaction.
en_quotes.author: George Lorimer

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is built by consistently performing small acts of courage.
en_quotes.author: Robin Sharma

en_quotes.quote: When you have a well-developed body and you're confident, you see people bending your way, wanting to be on your side, wanting to do things for you.
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: If I want to be great I have to win the victory over myself…self-discipline.
en_quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

en_quotes.quote: Strength is the product of struggle. You must do what others don’t to achieve what others won't.
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between your bodybuilding goals and bodybuilding success.
en_quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

en_quotes.quote: Biceps are like ornaments on a Christmas tree.
en_quotes.author: Ed Coan

en_quotes.quote: Self-discipline is about controlling your desires and impulses while staying focused on what needs to get done to achieve your goal.
en_quotes.author: Adam Sicinski

en_quotes.quote: It took me 20 years of hard training to get the physique I have today. What you need is what I had – belief in yourself!
en_quotes.author: Branch Warre

en_quotes.quote: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.
en_quotes.author: Virat Kohli

en_quotes.quote: Sell yourself short on nutrition and you’re selling yourself short on maximizing your physique development.
en_quotes.author: Ernie Taylor

en_quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day-in and day-out.
en_quotes.author: Robert Collier

en_quotes.quote: I don't diet and exercise. I eat and train.
en_quotes.author: J.R. Rim

en_quotes.quote: When it gets difficult is often right before you succeed.
en_quotes.author: Jeffrey Walker

en_quotes.quote: Fortunately, there is a solution, and it’s not performing multiple sets of whatever cable Kegel exercise is being pushed as 'The Answer.' Just a little hard, smart, basic work.
en_quotes.author: Jim Wendle

en_quotes.quote: You were born to win. But to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Vision creates faith and faith creates willpower. With faith, there is no anxiety and no doubt – just absolute confidence in yourself.
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: Haters don’t hate you, they hate themselves. Because you’re a reflection of what they wish to be.
Intensity builds immensity.
en_quotes.author: Kevin Levrone

en_quotes.quote: My old routine was McDonald's on the way to the gym, coffee during my workout, Burger King and Copenhagen post-workout.
en_quotes.author: Dave Tate

en_quotes.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
en_quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Your love for what you do and willingness to push yourself where others aren't prepared to go is what will make you great.
en_quotes.author: Laurence Shahlaei

en_quotes.quote: Losers quit when they fail. Winners fail until they succeed
en_quotes.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: On the Internet, everyone squats. In real life, the squat rack is always empty. You figure out what this means.
en_quotes.author: Steve Shaw

en_quotes.quote: They can crack jokes. They can sit back and analyze and criticize and make all the fun they want. But I’m living my life, I’m doing it and pulling my weight. What are you doing?
en_quotes.author: Kai Greene

en_quotes.quote: It's a rare individual who lets themselves be steered by what they feel is their own passion.
en_quotes.author: Dave Tate

en_quotes.quote: I never think about losing - only the next weight I train.
en_quotes.author: Lou Ferrigno

en_quotes.quote: Trust me, if you do an honest 20 rep program, at some point Jesus will talk to you. On the last day of the program, he asked if he could work in.
en_quotes.author: Mark Rippetoe

en_quotes.quote: I don’t eat for taste, I eat for function.
en_quotes.author: Jay Cutler

en_quotes.quote: There is no reason to be alive if you can't do the deadlift!
en_quotes.author: Jon Pall Sigmarsson

en_quotes.quote: Push yourself because no one else is going to do it
Being negative and lazy is a disease that leads to pain, hardships, depression, poor health and failure. Be proactive to achieve success!
Stimulate don’t annihilate.
en_quotes.author: Lee Haney

en_quotes.quote: There is no strength without struggle.
Don't ever believe you have nothing to lose. There's always something to be lost when you change something or try something new. Nothing is ever free. Not even experience.
en_quotes.author: Paul Carter

en_quotes.quote: Come in the gym like you’re going to war.
I would like to be the first man in the gym business to throw out my scale. If you don’t like what you see in the mirror, what difference does it make what the scale says?
en_quotes.author: Vince Gironda

en_quotes.quote: There's more to life than training, but training is what puts more in your life.
en_quotes.author: Brooks Kubik

en_quotes.quote: If I have to die tonight, if this weight is going to kill me tonight, so be it! I’m dying where I wanna be…
en_quotes.author: Kai Greene

en_quotes.quote: Most champions are built by punch the clock workouts rather than extraordinary efforts.
en_quotes.author: Dan John

en_quotes.quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
en_quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: Mediocre athletes that tried like hell to get good are the best coaches.
en_quotes.author: Mark Rippetoe

en_quotes.quote: If you lack motivation, I can't help you with that. That's your problem to solve.
en_quotes.author: Stan Efferding

en_quotes.quote: Learn it all, then forget it all.
en_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

en_quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is doing what you hate to do, but nonetheless doing it like you love it.
en_quotes.author: Mike Tyson

en_quotes.quote: You have to be at your strongest when you’re feeling at your weakest.
I'm not the kind of guy who tries to run between the drops. Sometimes you gotta get a little wet to reach your destination.
en_quotes.author: Erik Fankhouser

en_quotes.quote: Rule of thumb: Eat for what you’re going to be doing and not for what you have done. Don’t take in more than you’re willing to burn off.
en_quotes.author: Lee Haney

en_quotes.quote: I'm not sold on one diet philosophy. I'm sold on whatever will work for you.
en_quotes.author: Dave Tate

en_quotes.quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: There is no such thing as overtraining, just under nutrition and undersleeping.
en_quotes.author: The Barbarian brothers

en_quotes.quote: The barbells and dumbbells you hold in your hands and the way you use them have stories to tell.
en_quotes.author: Craig Cecil

en_quotes.quote: I don’t do this to be healthy; I do this to get big muscles.
en_quotes.author: Marcus Ruhl

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishments.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: Remember - If you want to beat the man, you've gotta out-eat the man!
en_quotes.author: JM Blakely

en_quotes.quote: I'm the strongest bodybuilding who ever lived, I think
en_quotes.author: Franco Columbu

en_quotes.quote: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: Don’t have $100.00 shoes and a 10 cent squat.
en_quotes.author: Louie Simmons

en_quotes.quote: Don’t measure yourself by what you have accomplished, but by what you should have accomplished with your ability.
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: People who avoid failure also avoid success.
en_quotes.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: Some are born strong and others are made strong.
en_quotes.author: J.R. Rim

en_quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: If you aren’t begging for rest. Then you aren’t training your best.
The body always fails first, not the mind. The trick is to make the mind work for you, not against you.
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: Courage doesn’t always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow.'
en_quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

en_quotes.quote: What is the point of being alive if you don’t at least try to do something remarkable?
en_quotes.author: John Green

en_quotes.quote: If you think lifting weights is dangerous, try being weak. Being weak is dangerous.
en_quotes.author: Bret Contreras

en_quotes.quote: Tough times don’t last. Tough people do.
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

en_quotes.quote: Failure doesn’t kill you… it increases your desire to make something happen.
en_quotes.author: Kevin Costner

en_quotes.quote: Bodybuilding is much like any other sport. To be successful, you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training, diet and mental approach.
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: When you hit failure, your workout has just begun.
en_quotes.author: Ronnie Coleman

en_quotes.quote: For me, life is continuously being hungry. The meaning of life is not simply to exist, to survive, but to move ahead, to go up, to achieve, to conquer.
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: I was never a natural athlete, but I paid my dues in sweat and concentration, and took the time necessary to learn karate and became a world champion.
en_quotes.author: Chuck Norris

en_quotes.quote: Gym is a sacred place which makes your life feel worth existing by putting the effort of care into the home of your soul called body!
en_quotes.author: Munia Khan

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes, instead of what you do in the weight room, it’s what you don’t do that will lead to success.
en_quotes.author: Jim Wendler

en_quotes.quote: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: Don’t measure yourself by what you have accomplished, but by what you should have accomplished with your ability.
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: There’s more to life than training, but training is what puts more in your life.
en_quotes.author: Brooks Kubik

en_quotes.quote: There is no such thing as overtraining, just under nutrition and undersleeping.
en_quotes.author: Barbarian brothers

en_quotes.quote: A champion is someone who gets up when they can’t.
en_quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

en_quotes.quote: To be a champion, you must act like a champion.
en_quotes.author: Lou Ferrigno

en_quotes.quote: The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit.
en_quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

en_quotes.quote: Obstacles can’t stop you. Problems can’t stop you. People can’t stop you. Only you can stop you.
en_quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

en_quotes.quote: Fitness is like a relationship. You can’t cheat and expect it to work.
Physical strength is the most important thing in life. This is true whether we want it to be or not.
en_quotes.author: Mark Rippetoe

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is the bridge between your bodybuilding goals and bodybuilding success.
en_quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

en_quotes.quote: Being negative and lazy is a disease that leads to pain, hardships, depression, poor health, and failure. Be proactive and give a damn to achieve success
en_quotes.author: Phil Heath

en_quotes.quote: Suck it up. And one day you won’t have to suck it in.
Getting fit is all about mind over matter.
en_quotes.author: Adam Hargreaves

en_quotes.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: If you aren’t hurting after a good workout then obviously you haven’t done something right.
en_quotes.author: Mark W Boyer

en_quotes.quote: Train insane or remain the same.
en_quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

en_quotes.quote: If a man achieves victory over this body, who in the world can exercise power over him? He who rules himself rules over the whole world.
en_quotes.author: Vinoba Bhave

en_quotes.quote: Work hard in silence. Let success be your noise.
en_quotes.author: Frank Ocean

en_quotes.quote: Of course it’s hard. It’s supposed to be hard. If it were easy, everybody would do it. Hard is what makes it great.
en_quotes.author: Tom Hanks

en_quotes.quote: Bodybuilding is an art, your body is the canvas, weights are your brush and nutrition is your paint. We all have the ability to turn a self-portrait into a masterpiece.
en_quotes.author: Kai Greene

en_quotes.quote: Age is no barrier. It’s a limitation you put on your mind.
en_quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

en_quotes.quote: Exercise is done against one’s wishes and maintained only because the alternative is worse.
en_quotes.author: George A. Sheehan

en_quotes.quote: If you ever lack the motivation to train then think what happens to your mind & body when you don’t.
en_quotes.author: Shifu Yan Lei

en_quotes.quote: Unless you puke, faint, or die, keep going.
en_quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

en_quotes.quote: Don’t limit your challenges, challenge your limits.
en_quotes.author: Jerry Dunn

en_quotes.quote: Train hard, turn up, run your best and the rest will take care of itself.
en_quotes.author: Usain Bolt

en_quotes.quote: If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.
en_quotes.author: Fred Devito

en_quotes.quote: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: I hate every minute of training. But I said, don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
en_quotes.author: Mohammad Ali

en_quotes.quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It’s about being better than you used to be.
en_quotes.author: Khloe Kardashian
